overview: What defines love?  Memories that you can fondly look at? Tomorrow's dream of togetherness? or the longing after separation?  Ibbani Tabbida Ileyali is a poetic tale of romance that intends to celebrate unconditional love. An attempt to capture the essence of yesterday's romance, the relevance of today's and the perpetual nature of it that can stand the test of the future!  We aspire to make you sing, smile, dance and savor the sweet melancholy.  A story that spans a decade encapsulating the days of college, career aspirations and adulthood! Urban cityscape, the greens and more importantly the dreamy atmospherics.  There's scent of summer, warmth of winter and the melody of monsoon!
title: Ibbani Tabbida Ileyali
